title: Confirmation missing in no-JS path
evidence: P-A notes L12; P-B notes L8; WCAG 4.1.3
notes: No-JS form submit redirects with no visible confirmation

title: Important tasks easily lost
notes: Users need a highlight or pin to prevent burying

title: Keyboard traps in other apps highlight risk
notes: Our app currently OK but must ensure full Tab reachability

title: Low contrast in bright sunlight
notes: Need to check Pico.css button contrast ratios

title: Screen reader needs consistent announcements
notes: Live region works for success but error messages may be missed

title: Accidental delete has no recovery
notes: No undo option increases stress; consider soft-delete

title: Skip link not validated with screen reader
Errors use polite live region
notes: Error messages should use assertive live region
